title: Civmec Grad Program
description:
Apply today for the chance to experience:✅
Exposure to diverse, large‑scale projects✅
Structured career progression and skill development✅
End‑to‑end insight across core business functions✅
A supportive, inclusive and future‑focused workplace

title: Focus Forward Program
description:
Graduating in 2028 or 2029? Curious where your STEM degree could take you?
FutureFocus is your chance to deep dive into the world of tech-driven trading. Packed with hands-on workshops and expert-led sessions, you'll learn directly from the engineers and traders behind our high-performance trading systems.
